title: Integrated Lesson Study (LS) and Instructional Suitability Criteria (DSC) Training Program for Mathematics Teachers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level Mathematical Theories and Over Three Years of Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Practical training-based workshop for in-service mathematics teachers using the LS-DSC framework, with provision of digital whiteboards and tablets

learning_goals: Development of collaborative planning skills to improve lesson design using LS and DSC tools
Strengthening competency in evaluating suitability by reflecting cognitive needs analysis when teaching mathematical concepts
Development of reflective practice-based lesson analysis and improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
